400.description: Could happen when dispatching to a device that is offline, the user doesn't have permission or an incorrect command _type_ for the device

get.description: Without any params, returns a list of the user's devices

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: Can only be used by admin users to fetch all entities

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Standard users can use this with their only with their own _userId_

get.description: Without any params, it returns a list of last known positions for all the user's devices

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: _deviceId_ is optional, but requires the _from_ and _to_ parameters when used

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: To fetch one or more positions. Multiple params can be passed like `id=31&id=42`

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: at least one deviceId or one groupId must be passed
